title: Ticket #4958: Remove rewriting "runOldLogic"; useless log spam
description: runOldLogic in /src/condor_utils/my_hostname.cpp (around line 418) is testing code put into place when the rewriting logic was massively overhauled. Unfortunately it generates false warnings in some cases, notably when shared port is on. It's outlives its usefulness, time to remove it.
